A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film is very confusing to me. Visually\, it was amazing. The cinematography and sound were great\, a true technical masterpiece. However\, from a narrative standpoint\, it was a disappointment. The humour was jarring and out of place\, plot points from the force awakens were resolved in a haphazard manner\, and the nonsensical subplots ie Rose and Finn's Disney casino adventure and cringy love story was a massive letdown for me. Nonetheless\, I was sufficiently entertained\, but I won't be rewatching this movie like how I rewatched the original trilogy a hundred times
